entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
